title: Roast carrots and parsnips with hazelnut dukkah
time: Hands-on time 10 min, oven time 40-50 min
description: These Middle Eastern inspired roasted root vegetables combine dukkah, hazelnuts and maple syrup for crunch, sweetness and depth of flavour. Perfect for a vegan vegetable feast, or to accompany roast meat.

method.Step 1: Trim the carrots and parsnips, then halve lengthways and put in a large baking tray. Toss with the olive oil and roast at 200°C/180°C fan/gas 6 for 35-40 minutes until cooked and golden.

method.Step 2: For the dukkah, combine the hazelnuts, coriander seeds and sesame seeds.

method.Step 3: Remove the veg from the oven and toss with the thyme sprigs, maple syrup and dukkah. Return to the oven for 5-10 minutes until golden and lightly charred.
